name: Hamdan Coin
description: The Hamdan Platform is a new, decentralized infrastructure engine that will enable world-changing projects to be created, launched, and brought to market. The first such launch project will be the HMC, a game-changing cryptocurrency that will provide a variety of functions and opportunities. The HMC will help with the deflationary nature of many fiat currencies by providing a digital asset that can be used as a store of value. HMC will also have the power of appreciation, which we believe will help millions of people have a valuable asset to increase their financial stature and situation. On the road map for HMC, in conjunction with our partners, will be the onboarding of local merchants to accept the HMC as a form of payment at retailers throughout the GCC and worldwide.
